kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
We will be releasing a public API to retrieve web page and reusable content item usages programmatically - this can be used in your search index update scenario.
Any time a content item or web page is updated you can use a [global event handler](https://docs.kentico.com/x/r4t1CQ) and call this new API to determine where the content is being used. Then generate new indexing tasks for each web page where the item is in use.
This update will be released in May 2025's Refresh, so stay tuned 👍.
